description: Listed building consent in connection with internal refurbishment of existing property with structural modifications to the lower ground floor replacement of existing single storey lower ground floor rear extension relocation of lower ground floor wc and relocation of lower ground floor kitchen en-suite to 2nd floor opening on first floor to provide access to rear master en-suite re-plumbing works and electrical works including new lighting internally and to rear garden new alarm system overhaul of sash windows and internal timber shutters re-roofing of roof to replace artificial slate tiles paving works to rear garden redecoration through out opening into lower ground floor from hall - reinstating previous opening into garden prior to rear conservatory minor digging down of lower ground floor slab to provide insulation and underfloor heating throughout Also full planning application reference P100324 submitted
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Detailed drawings in respect of the following should be submitted to and be approved by the Local Planning Authority before the relevant work is begun: 

a.	Details of the proposed opening between the rear and front rooms at second-floor level
b.	Details showing the appearance of the proposed pod

The development shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the details so approved, shall be maintained as such thereafter and no change therefrom shall take place without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.

REASON: In order to safeguard the special architectural or historic interest of the building included in the Statutory List.
